reviews.review_msg: Pointless name as she has not even one percent input in the course, the course is run by TM who is evading, vague and unsure. No clue about what to expect in the written exam. Useless and disappointing. It took me three hours to attempt half of the exam in the open book as it was totally unexpected. There was nothing from what we did for 13 weeks:(

There's isn't much I can add that hasn't already been said, scroll down and read the other comments because it's all true. I don't understand what her role is anyways, you never hear from her and it's always the TA that you're communicating with an marking everything. The instructions are SO unclear and vague for assignments, it's ridiculous.
